upgrade_id: # ATTACK SPEED UPGRADES (flat addition to attacks/sec)
# PROJECTILE COUNT UPGRADES (flat addition - only at higher tiers)
# ACCURACY UPGRADES (flat addition to hit chance %)
# EVASION UPGRADES (flat addition to dodge chance %)
# PRECISION UPGRADES (flat addition to crit chance %)
# REINFORCED ARMOR UPGRADES (flat addition to anti-crit %)
# AMPLITUDE UPGRADES (flat addition to spell power %)
# RESILIENCE UPGRADES (flat addition to status resist %)

upgrade_description: Weapons gain +10% chance to inflict burn.
Weapons gain +10% chance to inflict freeze.
Weapons gain +10% chance to inflict static.
Weapons gain +10% chance to inflict acid.
Weapons gain +10% chance to inflict gravity.
Gain +2% attack speed on every auto attack until the next tactical phase.
Gain +2% amplitude on every auto attack until the next tactical phase.
Restore 8% of damage dealt as shield points.
First attack each wave deals +100% damage.
Gain +50% damage when hull drops below 25%.
Gain +2 armor for each hit taken (max 20).
Each critical hit increases next crit chance by +5% (max 25%).
When destroyed deal 50% of max hull as damage in 3 square radius.
Once per combat revive at 25% hull when destroyed.
25% chance to reflect 50% of damage back to attacker.
Reduces projectile count to 1 but adds +100% damage per removed projectile.
10% chance on hit to damage up to 2 additional nearby targets for 50% damage.
Deal +50% damage to targets below 30% hull.
Interceptor (2). Destroy incoming projectiles within 2 squares.
Friendly ships within 4 squares gain +10% attack speed.
When hull drops below 15% teleport to deployment zone and gain invulnerability for 3 seconds.
10% chance to refund energy cost when casting ability.
+30% attack speed but each attack has 5% chance to jam weapons for 2 seconds.
Regenerate shields of allies within 3 squares at 5 points per second.
